title: Intensify Action
content:
Intensify Action is an ability in Splatoon 3.

Intensify Action lowers the charge time of the Squid Surge, allows the user to keep their momentum when performing consecutive Squid Rolls, and reduces the accuracy penalty after jumping or performing either Squid Surge or Squid Roll.[1]
